original_text: “‘The high priest, the one among his brothers who has had the anointing oil poured on his head and who has been ordained to wear the priestly garments, must not let his hair become unkempt or tear his clothes.
korean_text: 자기의 형제 중 관유로 부음을 받고 위임되어 그 예복을 입은 대제사장은 그의 머리를 풀지 말며 그의 옷을 찢지 말며

sentences.original_text: who has had the anointing oil poured on his head
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 머리에 기름 부음을 받은 자

sentences.original_text: and who has been ordained to wear the priestly garments
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 제사장의 옷을 입도록 임명받은 자

sentences.original_text: must not let his hair become unkempt
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 머리가 단정하지 않게 되어서는 안 되며
